definitions.definition: A small bag carried in the hand , used either when travelling or to carry tools for a specific job.
A small bag used chiefly by women for carrying various small personal items, sometimes considered as a fashion accessory.

main_definition: ( now rare ) A small bag carried in the hand , used either when travelling or to carry tools for a specific job. [from 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Commonwealth ) A small bag used chiefly by women for carrying various small personal items, sometimes considered as a fashion accessory. [from 19th c.]
( uncountable , music ) Ellipsis of handbag house . [from 20th c.]
